page.title: 15ECOLOGY 1
page.content: A WALK UP SHARPITOR The idea of an account of a walk up {Sharpitor}was to try and portray the different variations of plant life with height and aspect. The walk began from the main Princetown to Plymouth road(3 miles from Princetown,12 miles from Plymouth)at a height of{1125ft}above sea level.At this height there is bracken growing in abundance and where there is no bracken,grass is growing.As one proceeds up the tor,scattered trees are growing and they may provide some rest place for the rooks and crows that were seen. Skylarks and wheatears were seen out in the open.
